bibdata.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Guide for the Design and Installation of Cable Systems in Substations (Revision of IEEE 525-1992)
Unapproved IEEE Draft Guide for the Design and Installation of Cable Systems in Substations (Revision of IEEE 525-1992)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document is a guide for the design, installation , and protection of wire and cable systems in substations with the objective of minimizing cable failures and their consequences.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
